[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@remirror/react-hooks](./react-hooks.md) &gt; [useStateWithCallback](./react-hooks.usestatewithcallback.md)

## useStateWithCallback variable

Enables the use of state with an optional callback parameter in the setState value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
useStateWithCallback: UseStateWithCallback
```

## Remarks

The callback is called once when the state next updates.
